abilities.name: Evolutionary Call
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you play Meganium from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may search your deck for up to 3 in any combination of Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards. Show them to your opponent and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Delta Reduction
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
